title: Grow to Learn - Drip Irrigation Installation Demo

subtasks: Attaching a filter to the system.
Connecting the adapter to the main line.
Connecting the main line to the drip tape.

tasks.task: Attaching a filter to the system.
Installing a pressure regulator.
Attaching the main line to the system.

Expanding the system (as necessary).

Alternatively, the MAINTASK could be "Install basic drip irrigation system," and for additional features, you might refer to the system's manual. But in this context, the transcript is about installing a basic system. So probably the final list should include the tasks as detailed steps.

followed by a list of subtasks," it's best to make the main task "installing a drip irrigation system" and have each step as a subtask. The user can decide if they need the extension or not.
